通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 是否烘焙所有顶点的顶点权重
Operator which runs its self from a time: Where or not to bake vertex weights for all vertices

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 跳过所有位置变化（以厘米为单位）低于偏差阈值的顶点
Operator which runs its self from a time: Skip all the vertices whose position changes(in centimeters) are below the deviation threshold
Balance the quality and the speed

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 变形骨骼的最大扭曲角度
Operator which runs its self from a time: Maximum twist angle of the deform bones

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 每个顶点的最大影响骨骼数，请为移动设备减小该值（如 4
Operator which runs its self from a time: Max influence bones per vertex, please decrease the value (such as 4) for mobile devices

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 剪切低于阈值的顶点权重
Operator which runs its self from a time: Prune vertex weights which below the threshold

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 刷新状态栏的频率（帧/秒），刷新频率过高可能会降低烘焙速度。
Operator which runs its self from a time: How often(fps) to refresh the status bar, too high refresh frequency may reduce the baking speed

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 在对象属性窗口中创建一个面板
Operator which runs its self from a time: Creates a Panel in the Object properties window

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 沿当前视图将所选关节对齐至网格面
Operator which runs its self from a time: Align selected joints to mesh surface along current view

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 将所选关节对齐到网格表面
Operator which runs its self from a time: Align Selected Joints To Mesh Surface

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 沿当前视图将所选关节对齐至网格体积
Operator which runs its self from a time: Align selected joints to mesh volume along current view

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 将所选接点对齐至网格体积
Operator which runs its self from a time: Align Selected Joints To Mesh Volume

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 侦测网格体的最大光线投射次数，如果网格部分不是多面体，可以尝试较大的数值，但过大的数值可能会造成其他网格部分的干扰。
Operator which runs its self from a time: Max raycast hit count to detect mesh volume, you can try a bigger number if the mesh part is not manifold, but too big number might cause interference from other mesh parts

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 热扩散通道 = 像素分辨率 * 扩散环路
Operator which runs its self from a time: Heat diffuse pass = Voxel Resolution * Diffuse Loops
Whether or not the voxel job has finished

通过计时器自我运行的操作器: 检测已凝固的衣服，如果启用此选项，请确保所有骨骼都在角色中
Operator which runs its self from a time: Detect solidified clothes, if you enable this option, make sure that all bones are in the charecter
